EmailTemplate.name: Maintenance Announcement shorter followup - entering downtime very soon
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce will be unavailable for at least the next 12 hours. ((Downtime begins in about 45 minutes))
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Neo4j Salesforce constituents,
Salesforce will be unavailable (down for maintenance) for at least the next 12 hours:
Downtime starts:
San Francisco, CA, USA PST (UTC -8) Sat, Jan 9, 2021 9:00 am Malmö, Sweden CET (UTC +1) Sat, Jan 9, 2021 6:00 pm
Downtime ends:
San Francisco, CA, USA PST (UTC -8) Sat, Jan 9, 2021 9:00 pm Malmö, Sweden CET (UTC +1) Sun, Jan 10, 2021 6:00 am
What to expect after "downtime ends" We will send two more emails (one when downtime begins and another when it ends). The downtime this weekend allows us to add these features below :
ARR Auto calculated using term dates and/or contract months. Reps will not be able to edit, but do not have to figure out how to calc ARR ARR calculated in both local currency and USD (visible and reportable) New Sales stage - 98% Sales Ops Review. This is the sales stage that reps will move opps to. The 99% will be renamed to Finance Review. Finance will move opps to 100% (closed won). Terms Information section will be moved to the product line item. These fields include term start and end date, contract months, Payment terms, Invoice Frequency, etc...
If after Monday anyone notices anything unusual with their reports or these new features then contact salesforce@neo4j.com. Thanks everyone.
